show.subtitle: Dr. Jack Rasmus will focus on today’s continuing crisis in the U.S. and global economies.
show.title: alternativevisions

title: What Next For Occupy?
content:
Jack’s guests for today’s show, ‘What Next for Occupy’, include Kevin Zeese and Margaret Flowers, who will discuss... <!--more--> recent developments and new directions for the Occupy Movement.
Kevin and Margaret were both organizers for the 2011 ‘Occupy Washington DC’ movement.
Kevin is an attorney active in 3rd party politics in the DC area and co-director with Margaret of the ‘Our Economy’ research organization.
Margaret is an MD and health care advocate and a past Congressional Fellow for Physicians for a National Health Program.
